languages.text: "Хтонос был интересным экспериментом, он умел преобразовывать в топливо жизненную силу своих жертв. Но это был дурной, непослушный образец, и потому он сбежал". {n}Тервантьяс бросает на вас издевательский взгляд.{/n} "А вот тебе сбегать я не советую. Болевые ощущения от трансформации прекратятся, лишь когда я введу блокатор. А я сделаю это лишь в самом конце процедуры. Ты же не хочешь провести остаток жизни с ощущением, что твоя кожа плавится, а кости лопаются?"

"The Chtonos was an interesting experiment, one that could convert the life forces of its victims into fuel. But it was a flawed, disobedient specimen that escaped." {n}He glances at you mockingly.{/n} "I do not recommend escaping, specimen. The pain from the transformation only stops after I inject the blocker. And I only do it at the end of the procedure. Do you wish to spend the rest of your existence with the sensation of your skin melting and your bones snapping?"
languages.original_text: "Хтонос был интересным экспериментом, он умел преобразовывать в топливо жизненную силу своих жертв. Но это был дурной, непослушный образец, и потому он сбежал". {n}Тервантьяс бросает на вас издевательский взгляд.{/n} "А вот тебе сбегать я не советую. Болевые ощущения от трансформации прекратятся, лишь когда я введу блокатор. А я сделаю это лишь в самом конце процедуры. Ты же не хочешь провести остаток жизни с ощущением, что твоя кожа плавится, а кости лопаются?"

The pain from the transformation only stops after I inject the blocker. And I only do it at the end of the procedure. Do you wish to spend the rest of your existence with the sensation of your skin melting and your bones snapping?"

traits.locale_text: {n}The Haemonculus studies Abelard for a moment then sneers.{/n} "I recognise the traces of my creation. The Chtonos was an interesting experiment, one that could convert the life forces of its victims into fuel. But it was a flawed, disobedient specimen that escaped."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: « Le développement du Chtonos a été une expérience intéressante. Mon objectif était de concevoir une créature capable de convertir la force vitale d'un individu en énergie. Mais il n'était pas suffisamment obéissant et s'est enfui. » {n}Il vous lance un regard moqueur.{/n} « Je vous déconseille d'essayer de vous échapper, spécimen. La douleur causée par la transformation ne cessera qu'après l'injection du bloqueur, étape qui n'intervient qu'à la fin de la procédure. Voulez-vous avoir la sensation que votre peau se dissout et que vos os se brisent jusqu'à la fin de vos jours ? »
languages.original_text: "The Chtonos was an interesting experiment, one that could convert the life forces of its victims into fuel. But it was a flawed, disobedient specimen that escaped." {n}He glances at you mockingly.{/n} "I do not recommend escaping, specimen. The pain from the transformation only stops after I inject the blocker. And I only do it at the end of the procedure. Do you wish to spend the rest of your existence with the sensation of your skin melting and your bones snapping?"

traits.locale_text: « Le développement du Chtonos a été une expérience intéressante. Mon objectif était de concevoir une créature capable de convertir la force vitale d'un individu en énergie. Mais il n'était pas suffisamment obéissant et s'est enfui. » {n}Il vous lance un regard moqueur.{/n} « Je vous déconseille d'essayer de vous échapper, spécimen. La douleur causée par la transformation ne cessera qu'après l'injection du bloqueur, étape qui n'intervient qu'à la fin de la procédure. Voulez-vous avoir la sensation que votre peau se dissout et que vos os se brisent jusqu'à la fin de vos jours ? »
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: “奇托诺斯是件有趣的实验品，可以将受害者的生命力转化为燃料。然而，它却是个有缺陷、不听话的实验对象，从我这里逃了出去。”{n}他嘲弄般地瞥了你一眼。{/n}“我不建议尝试逃跑这种行为，实验对象。只有当我注射阻断剂之后，转化的痛苦才会停止，而且我只会在改造结束之后才会注射阻断剂。你应该不打算在全身皮肤熔化、骨头尽数折断的剧痛中度过余生吧？”
languages.original_text: "The Chtonos was an interesting experiment, one that could convert the life forces of its victims into fuel. But it was a flawed, disobedient specimen that escaped." {n}He glances at you mockingly.{/n} "I do not recommend escaping, specimen. The pain from the transformation only stops after I inject the blocker. And I only do it at the end of the procedure. Do you wish to spend the rest of your existence with the sensation of your skin melting and your bones snapping?"

traits.locale_text: {n}血伶人仔细打量了阿贝拉德一阵子，随后嗤笑起来。{/n}“我认出来了，这是我的造物留下的痕迹。奇托诺斯是件有趣的实验品，它可以将受害者的生命力转化为燃料，但它却是个有缺陷、不听话的实验对象，从我这里逃了出去。”
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: "Der Chtonos war ein interessantes Experiment, eines, das die Lebenskräfte seiner Opfer in Brennstoff umwandeln konnte. Doch er war ein mangelhaftes, ungehorsames Versuchsstück, das entkommen ist." {n}Er sieht dich spöttisch an.{/n} "Ich empfehle Euch nicht zu fliehen, Versuchsstück. Der Schmerz der Transformation endet erst, wenn ich den Blocker injiziere. Und das mache ich erst am Ende der Prozedur. Wollt Ihr den Rest Eurer Existenz mit dem Gefühl verbringen, dass Eure Haut schmilzt und Eure Knochen bersten?"
languages.original_text: "The Chtonos was an interesting experiment, one that could convert the life forces of its victims into fuel. But it was a flawed, disobedient specimen that escaped." {n}He glances at you mockingly.{/n} "I do not recommend escaping, specimen. The pain from the transformation only stops after I inject the blocker. And I only do it at the end of the procedure. Do you wish to spend the rest of your existence with the sensation of your skin melting and your bones snapping?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Haemonculus mustert Abelard einen Augenblick lang und verzieht dann verächtlich das Gesicht.{/n} "Ich erkenne die Spuren meiner Schöpfung. Der Chtonos war ein interessantes Experiment, eines, das die Lebenskräfte seiner Opfer in Brennstoff umwandeln konnte. Doch er war ein mangelhaftes, ungehorsames Versuchsstück, das entkommen ist."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: «El Chtonos fue un experimento interesante: podía convertir la fuerza vital de sus víctimas en combustible. Pero era un espécimen defectuoso y desobediente que acabó escapando». {n}Te mira, burlón.{/n} «No te recomiendo escapar, espécimen. El dolor de la transformación solo termina cuando inyecto el bloqueador, cosa que solo hago al terminar el procedimiento. ¿O acaso quieres pasarte el resto de tu existencia con la sensación de que tu piel se derrite y sus huesos se resquebrajan?».
languages.original_text: "The Chtonos was an interesting experiment, one that could convert the life forces of its victims into fuel. But it was a flawed, disobedient specimen that escaped." {n}He glances at you mockingly.{/n} "I do not recommend escaping, specimen. The pain from the transformation only stops after I inject the blocker. And I only do it at the end of the procedure. Do you wish to spend the rest of your existence with the sensation of your skin melting and your bones snapping?"

traits.locale_text: {n}El Hemónculo estudia a Abelard por un momento y luego lo mira con desdén.{/n} «Puedo reconocer las señales de mi creación. El Chtonos fue un experimento interesante: podía convertir la fuerza vital de sus víctimas en combustible. Pero era un espécimen defectuoso y desobediente que acabó escapando».
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: 「チャトノスは興味深い実験を行っていた。犠牲者の生命力を燃料へと変えることができるというものだった。だが、それには欠陥があった。反抗的な標本が脱走したのだ」{n}彼はあなたを嘲るように見た。{/n}「脱走するのは推奨はせぬぞ、標本よ。変異に対する苦痛を止めることができるのは、ブロッカーの注射だけだ。そして、それを行うのは処置の最後のみだ。皮膚が溶け、骨が軋む感覚を味わいながら、残りの生を過ごしたいか？」
languages.original_text: "The Chtonos was an interesting experiment, one that could convert the life forces of its victims into fuel. But it was a flawed, disobedient specimen that escaped." {n}He glances at you mockingly.{/n} "I do not recommend escaping, specimen. The pain from the transformation only stops after I inject the blocker. And I only do it at the end of the procedure. Do you wish to spend the rest of your existence with the sensation of your skin melting and your bones snapping?"

traits.locale_text: {n}ハモンキュラスはアベラルドをしばらく観察し、それから馬鹿にしたように笑う。{/n}「私は自分の創造物の痕跡を認識している。チャトノスは興味深い実験だった。犠牲者の生命力を燃料に変えることができたんだ。だが逃げ出したのは、欠陥のある不従順な標本だった」
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: "Ktonos; kurbanlarının yaşam güçlerini yakıta dönüştürebilen, ilginç bir deneydi. Kusurluydu yalnız. İtaatsiz bir numuneydi, dolayısıyla kaçtı." {n}Alaycı bir tavırla sana bakıyor.{/n} "Senin kaçmanı önermem numune. Dönüşümün acısı, yalnızca ben engelleyiciyi enjekte ettikten sonra durur. Bu işlemi de yalnızca prosedürün en sonunda yaparım. Varoluşunun geri kalanını, teninin eridiği ve kemiklerinin çatladığı hissiyle geçirmek ister misin?"
languages.original_text: "The Chtonos was an interesting experiment, one that could convert the life forces of its victims into fuel. But it was a flawed, disobedient specimen that escaped." {n}He glances at you mockingly.{/n} "I do not recommend escaping, specimen. The pain from the transformation only stops after I inject the blocker. And I only do it at the end of the procedure. Do you wish to spend the rest of your existence with the sensation of your skin melting and your bones snapping?"

traits.locale_text: "Ktonos, kurbanlarının yaşam güçlerini yakıta dönüştürebilen, ilginç bir deneydi. Kusurluydu ama. İtaatsiz bir numuneydi ve kaçtı." {n}Alaycı bir tavırla sana bakıyor.{/n} "Kaçmanı önermem numune. Dönüşümün acısı, yalnızca ben engelleyiciyi enjekte ettikten sonra durur ve bu işlemi yalnızca prosedürün en sonunda yaparım. Varoluşunun geri kalanını, teninin eridiği ve kemiklerinin çatladığı hissiyle geçirmek ister misin?"
traits.speaker: Haemonculae
